render.notes: The curved text 'OVERALL SPENT: 82%' is implemented using SVG textPath for precise curvature matching the original design. The gauge uses SVG paths with stroke-linecap round. The icons are recreated using SVG paths or emojis where appropriate to match the visual fidelity.
